result.title: Getting TLE on a codeforces problem
result.content: Hi everyone, I was trying to solve this problem on codeforces -439E - Devu and Birthday Celebration , But I was repeatedly getting TLE on 53rd test case. So I believe this issue has nothing to do with the correctness or complexity of my code (probably). I thought about it for a couple of hours but really couldn't understand the reason why I got TLE. Here's my submission â€” 21899705. Also, this happened to me a couple of times before, when I implemented a solution with the same complexity as in the editorial and got a TLE. So, any suggestions to improve my style of coding and to write efficient code are welcome. Thanks in advance :)
